page.title: 08A DAY IN A SCHOOLGIRL'S LIFE
page.content: AFTERNOON At 1315 lessons start again. On Tuesdays we learn different crafts until 1430. Then it is playtime again for 15 minutes. The last hour of this day is spent on Games, which may be athletics or various ball games such as tennis, football, netball, cricket, basketball, junior hockey or rugby, depending on the time of year. After school I stay to Gymnastics Club before going home.Every other week Amanda comes to my house before we go to Youth Club.We have a cooked meal in the early evening. If there is nothing else to do, we might go swimming in an outdoor pool when the weather is warm. At 2100 hours I go home, get ready for bed and read a book for a while before going to sleep.
